name: RPath-NF
rhs\_pattern: flat ordered list of Semantic Path Elements with χ\_step^{(n)} counted
conditions: all edges are Semantic Path Elements
update\_pseudocode: 1. Expand all compositions into a multiset of Semantic Path Elements.
2. Order them by χ (or by an explicit index).
3. Represent repeated consecutive χ-steps as χ\_step^{(n)}.
